subject: From The Desk
body:
From The Desk
JP Morgan Chase Bank
270 Park Avenue New York,
NY 10017, United States
Office Email:  
chasebnkdesk@accountant.com
Private E-mail:  
jpmorganwj641850@gmail.com
*How are you doing today.*
After several attempts to reach you on phone, I deemed it necessary and urgent to contact you via your e-mail address and to notify you finally about your outstanding compensation payment $10,700,000.00 USD deposited in our bank.
Hopefully you should receive an *SMS* Via *(35960)* Message for the Successful Release of your *On-Hold* Funds with your ( *Unlock Funds Code)* immediately the MD Successfully Updating your Payment Account File' if Not.
You can also restart your Phone to Confirm the *SMS links* to your Account Phone Successfully activated for the *Readiness of Wire Transfer of your Fund.*
Notify me back to my Chamber after your Successful Verification and *Confirmation of your release Code.*
Thanks
Mr. Don Irwin
Chase Bank Managing Director
Office Email:  
chasebnkdesk@accountant.com
Private E-mail:  
jpmorganwj641850@gmail.com

subject: Re:   From The Desk
body:

You can Head to the location of the Bitcoin ATM. Insert the amount of cash needed for the transaction, similar to inserting money in a regular ATM. Provide the address below of the Bitcoin wallet you want the crypto to be sent to. Confirm the final amount, and check over the details before you finish your transaction. 
Bitcoin ATMs allow a safe and easy way to transfer funds from your wallet to someone else's. All you need to do is insert the amount you wish to send and input the recipient's digital wallet address. Then you can follow the easy-to-understand instructions on the kiosk to ensure the funds have been transferred.
